title: Redberry bush

properties.value: Redberry bushes are Farming plants grown at level 10 Farming. A redberry bush is grown by planting 1 redberry seed in a bush patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 4 sacks of cabbages and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Redberry bushes are Farming plants grown at level 10 Farming. A redberry bush is grown by planting 1 redberry seed in a bush patch using a seed dibber. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 4 sacks of cabbages and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the Redberry seeds gives 11.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the patch, then disease in the patch may be removed using Plant cure, or using the Cure plant spell in the Lunar spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each berry, when picked, gives 4.5 farming experience. Checking the plant gives 64 farming experience. The berries can regrow once all are picked from the plant.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

Redberry bush

Patch Bush
Seeds per 1
Payment 4 sacks of cabbages
Growth time 100 min (5x20 min)
Yield 4+ (varies)
Regrow Yes

Crop Redberries

Checking XP 64 xp
Harvesting XP 4.5 xp
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Redberries1Always[d 1]331
Leaves1Always[d 2][d 3]Not sold0
  1. Only dropped by Grown version.
  2. Requires pruning with (magic) secateurs to cure disease.
  3. Only dropped by Diseased version.

'''Redberry bushes''' are [[Farming]] plants grown at level 10 Farming. A redberry bush is grown by planting 1 [[redberry seed]] in a [[bush patch]] using a [[seed dibber]]. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the allotment. Payment is 4 [[Cabbages|sacks of cabbages]] and optionally may be noted to save you space.

Planting the Redberry seeds gives 11.5 farming experience. If the farmer does not watch the patch, then disease in the patch may be removed using [[Plant cure]], or using the [[Cure plant]] spell in the [[Lunar]] spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]] (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

Each berry, when picked, gives 4.5 farming experience. Checking the plant gives 64 farming experience. The berries can regrow once all are picked from the plant.
